answers.answer: Im getting my test done at 28 weeks.
Ok thank you ladies! Im asking because this girl I know is only 12 weeks and shes getting it done today!
I'm 28 weeks and took mine yesterday. The orange was good!
And your friend can't be getting hers today. You gotta be between 24-28 weeks

If dr suspects the patient has gestational diabetes in early stages of pregnancy, the dr very well could order the gd test earlier than 24-28 weeks. However, they usually will have to do it again around the usual time of gd testing.
They think I have diabetes and im still not having mine ubtil 28 weeks im 24w3d at the min so not too long to wait I hveto have the 3 hour one straight away

Actually you can get it that early. I had mine in november and I am only 15 weeks. They had me take it early because of my dad being a diabetic and having to take insulin shots. Granted I also have to take it again at 28 weeks pregnant even though I already passed with flying colors.
I got mines done at 16 weeks and i was positive for the gestational diabetes

question: When do you usually have to drink the orange stuff? Im 19 weeks pregnant and I didnt get it yet.
title: gestational diabetes
